name: every-island
description: Ania's big dream is to collect postcards from every island in the world (at least those that have a postbox).

scripts.start: echo 'You may be interested in `npm run build` or `npm run dev`.'
scripts.build: scss --update style/:style/ && sed --in-place '/\/\* CSS \*\//,/\/\* \/CSS \*\// {//!d}; /\/\* CSS \*\//r style/main.css' template.xml && type xclip >/dev/null && xclip -selection clipboard -in template.xml
